vulnerability_findings.name: inefficient-state-variable-increment
vulnerability_findings.message: <x> += <y> costs more gas than <x> = <x> + <y> for state variables.

vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
RefundEscrow.beneficiaryWithdraw (RefundableCrowdsaleImpl.sol#895-900) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (RefundableCrowdsaleImpl.sol#897-898)

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Address.isContract (RefundableCrowdsaleImpl.sol#208-217) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: constructor (uint256 rate, address payable wallet, IERC20 token) public {
vulnerability_findings.message:
Crowdsale.constructor.rate (local variable @ RefundableCrowdsaleImpl.sol#392) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.rate (function @ RefundableCrowdsaleImpl.sol#429-431)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (RefundableCrowdsaleImpl.sol#571-579) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(openingTime >= block.timestamp,TimedCrowdsale: opening time is before current time) (RefundableCrowdsaleImpl.sol#573)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (RefundableCrowdsaleImpl.sol#598-601) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (RefundableCrowdsaleImpl.sol#600)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (RefundableCrowdsaleImpl.sol#607-610) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (RefundableCrowdsaleImpl.sol#609)
